pullRequest.title: Fix subscribeTopic with end time in the past not retrieving more than page size (master)
pullRequest.bodyText:
Detailed description:
Port of #531 to master
Which issue(s) this PR fixes:
Fixes #530
Special notes for your reviewer:
Checklist

 Documentation added
 Tests updated

commit.message:
Fix subscribeTopic with end time in the past not retrieving more than page size (#531)

* Fix subscribeTopic with end time in the past not retrieving more than page size

Signed-off-by: Steven Sheehy <steven.sheehy@hedera.com>

* Tweak tests

Signed-off-by: Steven Sheehy <steven.sheehy@hedera.com>

* Bump version to v0.5.5

Signed-off-by: Steven Sheehy <steven.sheehy@hedera.com>

* Upgraded to 0.8.2 r2dbc version for improved stability and bug fixes

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Co-authored-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

nodes.bodyText:
Did we want to just remove this?
Also I'm assuming we don't need a follow up item regarding any of the logic this removes, right?

commit.message:
Pin r2dbc-postgresql to exact version
